message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really enjoy it. I'm asking for $110 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can offer you $95 for the product. Looking forward to your response.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to go down to $105 for the product. Let me know if that works for you!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to offer $100 for the product. I hope this meets within your expectations.
